version_description:
This Update
- Modified the font style of main text.
- Updated the default interface style.
- Fixed the problem that the cursor is not displayed in the refresh style.
- Fixed a problem with the page preview.
- Fixed a problem with the layout of notes.
- Titles in pages display better.
- Resolved some unexpected jumps that may occur while browsing the web.

Last Update
- The layout of time displays better.
- Fixed some loading animation problems.
- Fixed some confusing layout problems.
- Fixed some problems when collecting a note.
- Less cellular data cost.
- Supports modifying the system text size.

This Update
- Supports iCloud sync data.
- Supports to find contents of collections.
- Supports night mode.
- Supports DuckDuckGo.
- Details.

Last Update
- Modified the font style of main text.
- Updated the default interface style.
- The layout of time displays better.
- Less cellular data cost.
- Supports modifying the system text size.

This Update
- Supports to mark links with Safari share extension.
- Better browsing experience.
- Supports to find contents of collections with multiple keywords.
- Details optimized and bugs fixed.

Last Update
- Supports iCloud sync data.
- Supports to find contents of collections.
- Supports night mode.
- Supports DuckDuckGo.

This Update
- An emergency fix with iCloud which caused Marklist can not boot.
- Supports to mark links with Safari share extension.
- Better browsing experience.
- Supports to find contents of collections with multiple keywords.
- Details optimized and bugs fixed.

Last Update
- Supports iCloud sync data.
- Supports to find contents of collections.
- Supports night mode.
- Supports DuckDuckGo.

This Update
- Supports to edit notes that had been marked.
- Supports to share and save notes as images.
- Supports to search in web pages.
- Supports to enter URLs in search bar to access web pages.
- Supports to send feedback.
- Better iCloud sync.
- Lower brightness in night mode.
- Details optimized and bugs fixed.

Last Update
- Supports to mark links with Safari share extension.
- Better browsing experience.
- Supports to find contents of collections with multiple keywords.

I am sorry for the data error in iOS 11 caused by updating of the syntax.
Please update to this version before upgrading the iOS 11 system.
